alerts.title: Transgender Kansans had their IDs invalidated overnight, causing confusion and panic
alerts.summary: Matthew Neumann, a transgender man in Larned who runs an LGBTQ+ mutual aid organization, describes the immediate impact of Kansas's new law invalidating IDs.

alerts.title: Kansas revokes driver's licenses from trans residents in latest assault on rights
alerts.summary: Law demanding IDs match 'sex at birth' also includes bathroom ban provision for trans people in public buildings.

alerts.title: Kansas invalidates driver's licenses, birth certificates of over 1000 transgender residents
alerts.summary: A new Kansas law takes effect, invalidating driver's licenses and birth certificates for over 1,000 transgender residents.

alerts.title: Kansas invalidates more than 1,000 transgender residents' driver's licenses, birth certificates
alerts.summary: Kansas law takes effect impacting over 1,000 people. Affects driver's licenses and birth certificates for transgender residents.

alerts.title: NWLC Reacts to EEOC's Latest Move to Attack Transgender Workers' Rights
alerts.summary: The National Women's Law Center responds to EEOC actions affecting transgender workers' rights to access bathrooms.

alerts.title: Missouri House passes bill to make transgender athlete ban permanent
alerts.summary: Legislation passes to permanently ban transgender athletes from women's sports in Missouri.

summary: Major news today focuses on Kansas's first-of-its-kind law that invalidates gender marker changes on drivers' licenses and birth certificates for over 1,000 transgender residents. The law also includes bathroom restrictions. Additionally, Missouri passed legislation to make its transgender athlete ban permanent.
